content: **knitted reversible hipster-hat / hat in drops air sizes s - xl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no ai-365 yarn group c or a +a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m m/l l/xl fits head size approx 54/56 56/58 58/60 cm height with 10 cm turn-up = 24-25-26 cm **materials** drops air from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 50-50-100 g colour 01 off white 50-50-100 g colour 02 wheat needles drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 drops double pointed needles size 4 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm **knitting gauge ** 19 stitches in width and 25 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size -------------------------------------------------------
